para: IsotropicRank4TensorCij is a rank 4 tensor with isotropic symmetry. It is parametrized by its two independent components, c11 and c12.

The dialog box for setting the value of the tensor is shown in . Although the tensor only has two independent components, there are three different numbers that can be changed in the dialog: C11, C12, and C44. Changing any of them will update the others. If C11 or C12 is changed, a new C44 will be computed when the user hits return or clicks elsewhere. If C44 is changed, C12 will be recomputed.
